title: "LenDenClub Alpha launches ‘The Bharat Fintech Program’ to invest in Rural Fintech Start-ups"
excerpt: "In a bid to encourage and support innovative start-ups in semi-urban and rural India, LenDenClub Alpha, a corporate venture capital (CVC) of LenDenClub, has launched ‘The Bharat Fintech Program’ in association with Startup Réseau."
